sentences.english: The Jiapigou gold deposit lies in the lower part of the late Archaean greenstone belt.
sentences.chinese: 夾皮溝金礦產於晚太古宙綠巖帶的下部層位。

sentences.english: To share credit information of credit customer with bottler.
sentences.chinese: 與太古可口可樂各個裝瓶廠分享信用客戶信用信息。

sentences.english: About 12, 000 little penguins are said to live on Montague Island.
sentences.chinese: 據說，有大約一萬兩千只小藍企鵝生活在蒙太古島上。

sentences.english: The appearance of Apocalymon was recorded in a prophetic book from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 太古的預言書記錄下來了啓示錄獸的出現。
姓不姓蒙太古又有什麼關係呢？

sentences.english: From the dawn of time, Nature has single-tasked quite nicely.
sentences.chinese: 從太古之初以來，自然的每個任務都完成的相當不錯。

sentences.english: I speak the pass-word primeval, I give the sign of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 我說出太古的暗語，我發出民主的信號。

sentences.english: Felsic gneiss is the most widely distributed rock type in Archean metamorphic complex areas.
sentences.chinese: 長英質片麻岩是太古宙變質雜巖區最主要的岩石類型。

sentences.english: East is a brand new Hotel located in Taikoo area of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 東隅酒店是一家全新的酒店，位於香港的太古地區。

sentences.english: The gold content of the Archean Taihua Group greenstone belt is lower than Clarke value.
sentences.chinese: 太古宙太華羣綠巖帶金的丰度低於克拉克值。

sentences.english: Engaged in the sales promotion and investigate of Guangdong Taigu Coca Cola in Shantou.
sentences.chinese: 參與廣東太古可口可樂汕頭地區促銷及調研活動。

sentences.english: This dental scheme is only for SHKSA members and their family members.
sentences.chinese: 此牙齒保健計劃只供太古職員會會員及其家屬參加。

sentences.english: Benvolio, nephew to Montague, and friend to Romeo.
sentences.chinese: 班弗里奧，蒙太古的侄子及羅密歐的朋友。

sentences.english: Remember who you were in those ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 回念起您曾正在那些太古的時期。

sentences.english: This, by his voice, should be a Montague .
sentences.chinese: 聽這個人的聲音，好象是一個蒙太古家裏的人。

sentences.english: In Japan, some pearls from the Pacific times already exist.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，珍珠大約從太古時代就已經存在了。

definition: the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
Shengzu, temple name of the second Qing emperor, known as the Kangxi Emperor (1654-1722)/cf. 康熙[Kang1 xi1]
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
